website_summaries.verdict: A quality silicone donut pan that costs a little more but includes helpful recipes from a company with great customer service.
pros: Easy to clean, nonstick, and makes almost full-size donuts, unlike most metal donut pans
Also includes recipes and a cloth storage bag
cons: Some buyers recommend letting donuts cool before removing from the pan

customer_reviews.title: Made perfect donuts
customer_reviews.text: I have used this three times now and have been 100% pleased. I found that spraying with a little Pam helped them to come out much better. The last time I used it was for the chocolate donuts recipe that came with the product. It's a keeper as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rogges!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Want to start by saying I paid full price for this. I used this to make protein donuts and this pan is the perfect size. It's a little smaller than a standard donut but still a great size. Also the color of the color of this is just Omg, it's gorgeous. My only negative about this is it really clings in terms of its hard to clean and if you use chocolate batter like I did it will faintly stain it. I recommend and I will be purchasing another one soon
customer_reviews.author: Brittany W

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Donuts On Demand!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be simpler. My first batch was made with a Kodiak Cakes pancake mix and a recipe online. I subbed xylitol for cane sugar and mixed in a pie spice mix. Not a bad high-protein, low-calorie breakfast. I made my second batch from a box cake mix, an egg, coconut oil, and water. I only had a vanilla cake mix on hand, and it made a pretty good finished product that I iced with a chocolate ganache. With the number of cake mixes and toppings options, let your imagination soar!
customer_reviews.author: Marfab21

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Worked like a champ. Easy to remove donut/food. Quick easy clean up. These are my Keto Egg and cheese bagels.
customer_reviews.author: SF Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 12 Days!
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money! I bought these to use as slow feeder bowl’s for my dog. I can’t believe I bought four of them! I received them 12 days ago and immediately noticed they didn’t pass the pinch test, so they are definitely not LFGB certified silicone as the description claims. At $17 apiece, I already knew I had made a big mistake. I decided to hand wash these, since I knew they were poor quality and just 12 days after receiving them, they have already broken on the frame! This listing is a fraud. Pictures attached show the broken frame and the failed pinch test. Don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie P.

customer_reviews.title: Full size
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to extra grease the mold. I have a baking business and usually never have issues with the molds or pans i use. This one i wasted 2 batches of donuts until i realized i had to REALLY use alot of spray so they didnt stick. Overall, donuts looked gorgeous, my customer loved them.
customer_reviews.author: BoricuaBarbie909

customer_reviews.title: I think the weight of the pan is good and the size was what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I received my order quickly. It was packaged very well and even included a muslin storage bag for the pan. I think the weight of the pan is good and the size was what I expected. The added card with a couple recipes was a nice touch. I decided after looking it over to purchase a second one so I can do large batches of donuts for family. I think these will make a great addition to my baking pans. The price was good. Can't wait to try them out and then add comments regarding how they perform.
customer_reviews.author: Raga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect donut pan
customer_reviews.text: Good donut pan for whole food, plant based diet (oil, sugar and salt free too). I have a recipe to try in this pan and I know it will be perfect. Love the storage bag. I have used this pan for a wfpb recipe. Worked great. NO oil. Let the donuts sit a few minutes and they came out of the pan great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this silicone pan so doughnuts are now back in ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't eaten doughnuts in years because they're always fried and so fattening. I love this silicone pan so doughnuts are now back in my life. Even though my vegan recipe called for no oil, my healthy, whole wheat doughnuts came out perfectly, didn't stick, and tasted great! It also makes the perfect size doughnut. I can't wait to try more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried one recipe and the donuts were too dense but that was the fault of the recipe. I did brush the inside of the mold with coconut oil as was mentioned in other reviews. The donuts came out easily and clean up of pan was quick. I am ready to try a better recipe perhaps one that came with the pan.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Never had a donut pan or made any type of donut before, but this pan has made me see how easy it is, as well as the endless possibilities to make healthier donuts. I followed someone else’s suggestion of placing pan on a cookie sheet so it would be easy to put in and take out of the oven. Donuts easily pop out of pan and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Iargalon

customer_reviews.title: Great for home baker
customer_reviews.text: My husband is recently diabetic type 2, and still craves the foods that got him into that predicament. These are great for baked donuts. Clean up easily when resprayed/oiled prior to baking. Do use on a cookie sheet for stability. We used King Arthur donut mixes and had better luck than the recipe included with the pans, which was for mini donuts.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Austin

customer_reviews.title: First rate , high quality professional product .
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan to make savarin for the restaurant and bagels at home . Results in a larger baked product than most other molds deliver. Comes with a storage bag as well . A very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: JNG

customer_reviews.title: Trouble getting the doughnuts out
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers point out, you may need to oil this down, which defeats the purpose of using silicon IMO. Of course this will depend on your recipe. I have been trying to make a rather fragile whole wheat cake doughnut in this, and there's no getting them out without losing a few. For more conventional recipes it might work fine.
customer_reviews.author: sometomato

customer_reviews.title: Buy it Already!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! Heavy duty, washed up clean! Amazing!! Love the color. It came in a beautiful bag. VERY VERY impressed with this company and will look for more pans by them!
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with the way they cooked and ultimately turned out
customer_reviews.text: I received my donut pan very quickly! The very next morning I made of batch of cake donuts. I was pleased with the way they cooked and ultimately turned out. Although, next time I will only fill halfway and will spray with non-stick spray so they will all come out without sticking. I am looking forward to using this again! Also, I loved that this pan has its own "dust bag" just like my Kate Spade purses!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: must use a pan to support donut pan
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and clean, beats the old metal ones.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Making doughtnuts is tons of fun and super easy to do with this pan. Definitely at most just fill half way otherwise it'll overflow. Grease really well also!! If you don't grease it, they'll stick! Especially grease the center!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well
customer_reviews.text: We had to experiment a little with timing. Over all pretty good. Donuts popped out well but don't try to take them out for at least 1/2 hour of cooling. Also put a baking pan under the Wappa pan while baking and cooling. Makes great donuts. Bagels are next.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J

customer_reviews.title: Silicon Donut Pan
customer_reviews.text: Merchandise arrived promptly and was as described. Used it for the first time and was pleasantly impressed at the ease of getting the donuts out of this pan. The donuts were a success.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Ariano

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Looking for good baking pan. A friend recommended silicon. So far this pan has don the job. So far, so good. I will update this review if things change.
customer_reviews.author: tekno-maniac

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first silicone baking item and it works great. It is substantial weight and easy to fill and use. I placed it on a cookie sheet for the oven. It baked evenly and removing the bagels after cooling for a few minutes was so easy. No problem with cleaning either. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Light

customer_reviews.title: Good sized pan
customer_reviews.text: It looks like this will be a durable pan. It is deeper than my metal ones so I think my donuts will come out much better.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pan makes baking fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new pan! My twins have food allergies so I wanted to make them some fun donuts since they can't eat at donut shops. I thought I would use this pan more than frying up donuts. The pan was foolproof. Clean up was a breeze. They loved them!
customer_reviews.author: D.L. Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is made of a floppy plastic? Doesn’t seem to transmit heat very well. Couldn’t get my donuts to bake in anywhere near the time suggested. NOT a user friendly pan, at all. I would advise you get something metal.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and easy to use. This arrived quickly and with two recipes along with a recipe for frosting. Easy to pop out the finished donut and so easy to clean, just make sure to spray some non-stick spray in the cavities before you pour in your batter. Definitely a nice way to save money and fun activity to do with a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: HFC

customer_reviews.title: All the above.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the large size donut size molds. Did not like the "non-rigid" nature of the material which resulted in difficulty in handling when moving into and out of the oven as well as difficulty when flipping over onto the cooling racks. Also found the sample recipes confusing because the recommended baking temperature on one was 425 while the other was 350. Also found spilled batter outside of the mold cavity would not clean completely without leaving stains.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are huge and easy to clean. I bought one to make some high protein "donuts" and they turned out great. Bought another one. Highly recommend it. Great product and you can tell it's high quality!
customer_reviews.author: evelyn lee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make Simply Keto Everything Bagels and it works perfectly. It is so easy to cook in, clean and store. Plus it is really pretty. I wish more kitchen appliances were this colorful.
customer_reviews.author: carrie lee

customer_reviews.title: I have the wilton brand donut pans as well. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the wilton brand donut pans as well. Comparatively, this pan's donut cavities are about 30% larger. I couldn't tell from any of the provided info or reviews if this would be the case but this pan will produce much larger donuts than the other pans available. Ordering another one now!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: "Excellent product! Followed instructions which said DO NOT use a non-stick spray as this pan was already a non-stick product. Donuts released beautifully! Definitely will be recommending this product to my friends."
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: This pan is fantastic. I used to to make my first batch of donuts and they came out perfect. I did have to cook them a couple minutes longer then the recipe, but I'm not sure if that was because of the pan or the recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Doughnuts for me!
customer_reviews.text: I used this last night to make gluten free douhnuts. They were fabulous. This did smell a little funny in the oven - like melting plastic - but there are no indentations on the pan. I didn't use any cooking spray and they did not stick. Very easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: renee d.

customer_reviews.title: Should  be a dozen
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to remove and clean but only used once hopefully it will continue after a few uses
customer_reviews.author: kevin kizer

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, large pan. I use it for donuts and bagels.
customer_reviews.author: M. Swank

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this donut pan! I’m using it to make gluten free bagels and it’s perfect. Regular donut pans are just too small!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove this donut pan!!!! So easy to use. I have already made several bagels with it. I plan on reordering this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: This is very interesting amazing item. So easy to use and clean. But took little more time to bake than recipes.
customer_reviews.author: meeko

customer_reviews.title: Love my donut pan.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, well made and easy to clean. Love being able to make healthy donuts for my family. Guilt free donuts that's healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I waited to so long to get a silicone donut pan. Don’t know what I did without it!
customer_reviews.author: Nettiefit

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I made donuts and it is so easy to clean. Donuts didn’t stick and fell right out.
customer_reviews.author: mea

customer_reviews.title: According to her this is the best thing ever and she couldn’t be happier with it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my very crafty 10 year old niece so she could make silicone donuts to play with. According to her this is the best thing ever and she couldn’t be happier with it. So, according to a 10 year old future Martha Stewart, this is the best donut maker pan anyone could want. You should probably buy one. Or two.
customer_reviews.author: JMacLean

customer_reviews.title: Best baking pan ever
customer_reviews.text: Best baking pan ever; NOTHING sticks, so it's easy to get the donuts out without them crumbling from sticking to the sides. Super easy to wash, too!
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: No Sticking
customer_reviews.text: Love the non-stick! So nice to not be losing half your baked goods to the tin or paper muffin cups. Cleaning takes about 3 seconds. Makes standard sized donuts. Paleo donuts (find a recipe)!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Your paying for a custom bag why??
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pan but extremely overpriced buying. Maybe if they left out the USELESS cloth custom toe string cotton designer bag it is in the price would reflect what you
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Pan works well
customer_reviews.text: The bagel pan worked well, no sticking, but we did use a little PAM on it first. We put it on a baking sheet to give it more support because the pan is floppy.
customer_reviews.author: Stot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is amazing!! I just made low-carb bagels that came out perfect! They popped right out of the pan! It comes in a great cloth sack that will keep it protected in the cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It’s an ideal addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it is so easy to use. I have made several batches of begals in it and love the way they just fall out of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to pick it up with both hands and the ends when placing it in or getting it out of the oven.  Use hot pads!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little getting used to the movement of the pan but overall I like the Wappa. I do not like the recipe they sent. It tastes like a combination of bagel and cake donut, a little heavy for my pallet and not much flavor.
customer_reviews.author: annabella

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Non stick works well. Clean up is a breeze. Cooks evenly and the wife loves the color.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan! Very heavy duty, a much thicker silicone that what I had anticipated ! I’ve made bagels as well as donuts :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Pan arrived dirty, I will be returning. Looks like it has possibly been used... I rubbed a couple of areas with a damp white towel and it left behind a brown residue.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: First time ever making donuts and this pan was perfect! Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: lmt

customer_reviews.title: and it was great to have perfectly made donuts and they did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Was very neatly packed when it arrived. It also came in its own fabric pouch (really neat)! Used it to make my first batch of paleo donuts today...and it was great to have perfectly made donuts and they did not stick to the pan (I didn't even spray it with any oil). Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slight smell at very high temps
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned the pan had melted when I could smell burning rubber cooking dounts in 425 degree oven. But when I checked all was well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great donuts
customer_reviews.text: My family is now addicted to warm donuts in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: MeliMae

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a quality item
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest pan I’ve ever bought it came with a super nice cloth bag definitely would recommend it to friends
customer_reviews.author: mindy cutrone

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Passes the pinch test so I know the quality is good, and my doughnuts came out easily without greasing the pan! :)
customer_reviews.author: NameSLH

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This pan was a little bit bigger than my other one so I was slightly sad when I got it, but it has the handles on the side which I really like. It's great and really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Decent pan, but
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product, my only issue is that you have to wait until the pan is 100% cool before removing your donuts. The instructions say 10 minutes. I tried removing 2 after ten minutes and it was not pretty 😒 I almost waited 25-30. I would recommend having two pan if you plan on making a large batch. Otherwise it is pretty good. Came with a awesome wappa gift bag 😃
customer_reviews.author: Kam W

customer_reviews.title: Caught on Fire After The Second Use
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan twice. The first time everything went fine and the donuts turned out well. The second time I used this pan it caught on fire after 4 minutes in a 350 degree oven. I cannot even begin to describe the mess in my oven after putting the fire out. Save yourself a mess and do not purchase this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mold
customer_reviews.text: We've put our mold through the paces and are really satisfied with the results. We have been making donuts with this mold for over two months now and my only complaint is not really knowing how to clean it so it looks as nice as the day we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Running with Ken ROCKS!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Makes full size donuts, our kiddo loves it. Durable and comes with a fabric canvas bag to store it in. I looked all over for silicone donut pan but stores only carries Teflon , which we don't use.
customer_reviews.author: Zana Moonflower, EntheoRadio

customer_reviews.title: The batch turned out well and were easy to remove from the pan
customer_reviews.text: Just made my first batch of donuts. I'm trying to make "better breads" using healthy flours and sugars. The batch turned out well and were easy to remove from the pan. I used coconut oil to grease the pans. I'm eager to try bagels soon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you would expect
customer_reviews.text: We spent ages looking for a "proper sized" bagel pan and this one fits the bill perfectly. We have tried steel "non stick" pans and they are next to useless, this one works prefectly. Even comes with it's own little storage bag! Can't reccomend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy clean and use. A great addition to my home made bagels. Very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Laquita Faust

customer_reviews.title: looks good. Although I haven't had a chance to try ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a timely matter, looks good. Although I haven't had a chance to try it out, I think I'm going to really like using it. Also I liked that it came with a few recipes. Looking forward to making my own donuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mold
customer_reviews.text: Great mold to use. I used mine to make soap with and it was so easy to get the soap out. Its also feels a bit larger than other donut molds. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Martie Swart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bagels
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan for homemade keto bagels. Totally nonstick and super fast clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Functional
customer_reviews.text: proud to give this item as a gift to a close friend.
customer_reviews.author: K. P.  Friedel

customer_reviews.title: perfect and the pan was easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This donut pan worked perfectly. The finished donuts popped right out, perfect and the pan was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Generous size
customer_reviews.text: This donut mold is way bigger than my metal pan ( which everything that I bake sticks to😥)
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent. I like the thickness of the silicone pan as i use it a lot and am confident that it'll last. Fast shipping, too. I'd gladly buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to apply butter or spray to the pan! also, its so easy to clean! Really good product! Definitely recommend other to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio G

customer_reviews.title: Love this Donut pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Donut pan! Cooks evenly, easy to clean and met my expectations. I spent a lot of time looking at all the silicone pans on Amazon and glad I chose this one. It comes with its own storage bag just like a high end Louis Vuitton purse! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Karen McNevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pan for Bagels and Donuts!
customer_reviews.text: This silicone pan is well made, easy to use and easy to clean. No sticking at all and made perfect bagels.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Zandel

customer_reviews.title: Very good silicone donut pan
customer_reviews.text: I used the large donut silicone pan to bake keto bagels (which were delicious). Very easy to use, clean and store. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JDPurvis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and pan cools off quickly. I was concerned about it’s “floppiness” when filled with batter so I put it on a cookie sheet to transfer it to the oven and then slid the sheet out. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen LaBruce

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. My first time using any type of donut pan, they came out great and nice and big- actual real size donuts!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Passed the pinch test
customer_reviews.text: Passed the pinch test! Love it, use it on the daily
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get it and make donuts! They came out so easy and cleaned up great! The only problem I had was me, I didn't put enough dough in so my donuts were a little thin!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: raysangel

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY Real Sized Donuts!
customer_reviews.text: While we do have some non-stick metal pans, those pans make medium donuts.... not bakery sized donuts. Make sure that you do use non-stick spray though silicone is non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon's Best Allergen Free Sweets

customer_reviews.title: Releases donuts easily
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am purchasing another one. So easy to get coconut flour donuts out of. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Vincent

customer_reviews.title: I love this silicon mold
customer_reviews.text: I love this silicon mold!!! So far I’ve made donuts and Keto bagels. Both times it was super easy to get the food out without sticking to the sides. I did use a small spray of cooking spray to ensure nothing stuck, and there was literally no clean up! Even came with a great cover for easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making donuts! Easy to clean and FULL SIZED. Great quality and no weird smell 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, and it even came in a nice canvas bag to store when not using it. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for me :)
customer_reviews.text: I've used the donut pan just once so far. After reading the reviews, I sprayed part of the pan with baking spray and left a few holes unsprayed, just to experiment. The donuts in the ungreased holes popped out just as easily. I wonder if this depends on the recipe you're using.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and I was surprised and pleased to see it comes in a canvas bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Low carb everything bagels turned out great! No issues removing them or cleaning the pan afterward. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. As other reviewers have stated there is a color difference between the top of the donuts and the bottom, but it's purely cosmetic and does not affect the taste at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C. Kacir

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Using it to make keto bagels. Works great and came with a bag for storage. Couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyshae

customer_reviews.title: so happy with this
customer_reviews.text: so happy with this. can be placed directly on wire racks. it's easy to clean and makes nice sized donuts.
customer_reviews.author: roadrunner22

customer_reviews.title: Boy this worked great! I sprayed them first and they popped out
customer_reviews.text: Boy this worked great! I sprayed them first and they popped out. It left the mold very clean. I highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The donut pan was exactly what I needed. I appreciated finding the recipes included and the storage bag is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: cooked evenly and turned out great. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This was my first attempt at making donuts at home and this pan worked perfectly! The donuts didn't stick at all, cooked evenly and turned out great. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Didn’t make donuts
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Didn’t make donuts, I made bagels. Very nice piece of kitchen equipment.
customer_reviews.author: P Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Spotty after cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty well. The only con is that it looks pretty spotty after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: margie barragan

customer_reviews.title: Best Donut Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome donut pan- bakes evenly and donuts pop out very easily- definitely recommend- and the color is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: K. Reiter

customer_reviews.title: I love my new donut pan
customer_reviews.text: I love my new donut pan! Easy clean up, and every batch I’ve made this weekend came out perfectly. I couldn’t be happier... except I’m thinking about ordering a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Robinlee

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, can’t wait to use it! Also, nice packaging!👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Malia R Calles

product_meta.title: Large Donut Pan – Non-stick Silicone Donut Mold Made Of Heavy Duty, Heat Resistant Material To Bake 9 Full Size Donuts/Bagels/Muffins & Other Delicacies – Professional Grade Doughnut Pan (Turquoise)
feature_bullets: EASY TO USE- CLEAN - RE-USE: You may clean it by hand-washing it or you can just put it in your dishwasher, and leave it at that. The silicone will not allow any dough-type to get stuck in the cavities, and even if they will, they fall off with some warm water, due to the pan's non-stick surface.

BAKE ANYTHING: All you have to do is put your dough of choice in place. Then let it get the job done! From tasty, uniquely shaped muffins and cookies to petit-fours & actually any bakery delicacy you wish.

HUGE & HANDY: Forget about those tiny little forms, through which the dough escaped, all the time - even if it stayed on, you could not enjoy your donut properly, because of its candy-size. We are talking about a family sized pan (14.4"x 12.6"x 1.18") with a capacity of 3 1/2" (9 cm) per cavity.

ASTONISHING QUALITY: True Silicon material, heat resistant up to 450° F, which means it does not melt in the oven, or destroyed in the dishwasher. Food safe it is; for your safety we have created a product that does not get discolored in your bakery, does not smell like burnt plastic in the oven, but it does allow your donuts bake even faster due to its molecular structure & durability.

MICROWAVE SAFE: You may easily use it in the microwave, with absolutely no danger of it, melting or causing any other problem to your devices. Highly resistant to microwaves, as well. We produce only the greatest products for the greatest cooks - you may be today among them!
